entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, a wizard who is being levicorpused by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A witch and one of Harry's best friends, who casts the levicorpus spell on Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's other best friend, a wizard who is also affected by the levicorpus spell.

relationships.description: Hermione casts the levicorpus spell on Harry, levitating him into the air.
Ron is affected by the levicorpus spell cast by Hermione.
Harry hits a suit of armor after being levitated into the air.
